name: Awakened Tree
languages: one language known by its creator

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 22 (4d8+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Broken Branch
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 18 (4d6+4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

special_abilities.name: Plant Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The tree is resistant to exhaustion and to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.
